channel.title: Czar source help! Person's position doesent get updated on my screen
channel.description: If the person is away from me but still in sight, if they teleport to me I still see them over there but really on their screen they are right by em... WTF???? I can't seem to fix this. Same thing if they use like monkeybars to get across... They are still by me but really they are across.?? Can someone help please?

item.title: Czar source help! Person's position doesent get updated on my screen
item.dc:creator: @elitescouter elitescouter
item.description:
@elitescouter wrote:

If the person is away from me but still in sight, if they teleport to me I still see them over there but really on their screen they are right by em… WTF??? I can’t seem to fix this. Same thing if they use like monkeybars to get across… They are still by me but really they are across.?? Can someone help please?
